name: Zugnaex
storyline: Zugnaex is a very powerful demon. If you say its name correctly, every single little tiny syllable, you will summon the demon & bring forth the apocalypse. But Zugnaex has never faced a foe like you. Battle online with your friends & overcome different challenges to ultimately face the demon itself.
summary: Immerse yourself in Zugnaex. Compatible with DOOM and DOOM II, it blends classic FPS action with a modern user interface and a detailed heads-up display. Enjoy single-player campaigns and free* online multiplayer for epic battles. (* - requires DOOM)
